name: MobileSystemFacade
doc: Common operations implemented by each mobile platform.

goToSettings.doc: Redirect the user to Phone's Settings

shareText.doc: Share the text via OS sharing mechanism.

hasPermission.doc: Returns whether the specified system permission has already been granted by the user.

requestPermission.doc: Requests a system permission from the user.

getInstallationDate.doc: Returns the date and time the app was installed as a string with milliseconds in UNIX epoch.

requestInAppRating.doc: Requests the system in-app rating dialog to be displayed

requestWidgetRefresh.doc: Sends a refresh signal to the native side, updating widget last sync

storeServerRemoteOrigin.doc: Sends the URL from the remote origin to be stored on the device
